foreword: A never ending learner, software architect and full-stack developer. Looking for an opportunity to bring quality technology, style and speed to real - sector economy. I do firmly believe that a system of any significance can nowadays be built only by a team. And a team, as opposed to a group of people, is grown around openness and truth. I want to be a part of a team, or help build a new one.

company.name: FCG Germany GmbH
company.description: Leading the digitization of the automotive sales sector through technology, infrastructure creation and the promotion of transportation financing solutions for SME and aspiring consumers in these frontier markets.

role.name: software engineer
responsibilities: participate in building the auction subsystem

company.description: Fintech startup aimed at helping its customers optimize their spendings and receive exclusive health insurance and electricity contracts.

role.name: CTO/full-stack developer
responsibilities: develop the first draft of the architecture
define the processes related to development
organize initial data load and processing

company.name: Cubits
company.description: An all-inclusive platform to buy, sell and accept Bitcoin.

role.name: full-stack developer
responsibilities: Re-architecture and re-implement an existing Django analytical system (C.M.I.) for the sales guys and the CEO due to its inability to any longer handle the high load
Architectured the system as a set of microservices implemented first in Python and rewritten for Node JS later
Re-created the design of the front-end via Flexbox and CSS Grid
Implemented data push to the client device via  WebSockets for near real-time data update
Created a live-search facility with help of Redis for the customers to be able to find any transaction by any significant search token in less than a second

company.name: Videopath
company.description: An inventor of an interactive video playing/enhancing platform.

role.name: full-stack developer
responsibilities: Architecture and implement a microservice-based system for video transcoding

role.name: analyst principal
responsibilities: Participate in refining product vision
Develop and manage the process of providing general analytics, competitor analysis
Develop and manage the process of collecting customer feedback
Research in the field of bleeding-edge client-side and server-side technologies and architectural approaches that could benefit ZeeRabbit GmbH — massive parallel computations
stream/batch processing, tools and libraries for client-side development, etc.
Create system architecture, initial design and implement statistical site for ZeeRabbit’s customers
Manage the documentation project ( API ), internal Knowledge Base
Participate in API design
Prepare business and technical presentations
Manage servers (Debian Linux) and security
Develop the ZeeRabbit Build Conveyer in Cmake
